original_text: And it shall come to pass, that on the sixth day they shall prepare that which they bring in; and it shall be twice as much as they gather daily.
korean_text: 여섯째 날에는 그들이 그 거둔 것을 준비할지니 날마다 거두던 것의 갑절이 되리라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
they shall prepare that which they bring in
and it shall be twice as much
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 두 배가 될 것이다
